targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(total_exec_time+total_plan_time) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
        AND ($queryid = '' OR queryid = $queryid)
        AND ($query = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, $query) > 0)
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query,
        queryid
    ORDER BY sum(total_exec_time+total_plan_time) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='pg_stat_statements', user='1' */
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(total_exec_time+total_plan_time) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate(1753642141)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753643941)))
    AND((created_at >= 1753642141) AND(created_at <= 1753643941))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753642141))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753643941))
    AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
    AND datname = 'test'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate(1753642141)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753643941)))
        AND((created_at >= 1753642141) AND(created_at <= 1753643941))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753642141))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753643941))
        AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
        AND datname = 'test'
        AND ('' = '' OR queryid = '')
        AND ('' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '') > 0)
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query,
        queryid
    ORDER BY sum(total_exec_time+total_plan_time) DESC
    LIMIT 15)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(calls) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
        AND ($queryid = '' OR queryid = $queryid)
        AND ($query = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, $query) > 0)
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query,
        queryid
    ORDER BY sum(calls) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg((total_exec_time+total_plan_time)/calls) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
        AND ($queryid = '' OR queryid = $queryid)
        AND ($query = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, $query) > 0)
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query,
        queryid
    ORDER BY sum((total_exec_time+total_plan_time)/calls) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,

        username,
        datname,
        query,
        queryid

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_hit / (shared_blks_hit + shared_blks_read)) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
        AND ($queryid = '' OR queryid = $queryid)
        AND ($query = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, $query) > 0)
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query,
        queryid
    ORDER BY sum(shared_blks_hit / (shared_blks_hit + shared_blks_read)) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.description: Number of shared memory bytes returned NOT from the cache

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_read * 8192) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
        AND ($queryid = '' OR queryid = $queryid)
        AND ($query = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, $query) > 0)
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query,
        queryid
    ORDER BY sum(shared_blks_read) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='pg_stat_statements', user='1' */
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_read * 8192) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate(1753642303)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753644103)))
    AND((created_at >= 1753642303) AND(created_at <= 1753644103))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753642303))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753644103))
    AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
    AND datname = 'test'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', queryid, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate(1753642303)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753644103)))
        AND((created_at >= 1753642303) AND(created_at <= 1753644103))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753642303))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753644103))
        AND hostname = 'LIGHTNING'
        AND datname = 'test'
        AND ('' = '' OR queryid = '')
        AND ('' = '' OR positionCaseInsensitive(query, '') > 0)
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query,
        queryid
    ORDER BY sum(shared_blks_read) DESC
    LIMIT 15)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.title: Shared blocks read

list.definition: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by datname order by datname
list.label: database
list.name: datname

query.formattedQuery: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 3 day) group by datname order by datname
query.query: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by datname order by datname
query.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='PostgreSQL (pg_stat_statements)', user='1' */
select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by datname order by datname

list.definition: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by hostname order by hostname
list.label: instance
list.name: hostname

query.formattedQuery: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 3 day) group by hostname order by hostname
query.query: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by hostname order by hostname
query.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='PostgreSQL (pg_stat_statements)', user='1' */
select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('test') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by hostname order by hostname
